anime.description: * Based on a miniature figure toyline for girls created by http://anidb.net/cr34240 [Spin Master] and http://anidb.net/cr10175 [Sega Toys]. The Candy Factory is a place where all Zoobles are born. Beyond that factory is a world called Candy Land, where all Zoobles live. The story revolves around the three main Zoobles: Chevy, a Cat Zooble with an Orange Flavour; Coron, a Rabbit Zooble with a Strawberry Milk Flavour; and Panky, a Panda Zooble with a Blueberry Yogurt Flavour. The three of them live in Candy Town, and they get into serious misadventures as they try to get in (and out of) trouble. Note: The series was produced by Korean animation studio http://anidb.net/cr13577 [Dongwoo Animation] and began airing on Korean broadcasting station SBS on May 18, 2011. An official Japanese dub version began airing in Japan on http://anidb.net/cr804 [TV Tokyo] on February 5, 2012, replacing http://anidb.net/a7535 [Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders] in its initial timeslot.

tag.name: shoujo
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shoujo, literally meaning "girl", refers to a female audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

episode.title: ダンシング・ズーブルズ! / 頑張れ! パンキー
Dancing Zoobles! / Go for it! Panky
Dancing Zoobles! / Ganbare! Panky
episode.summary: Dancing Zoobles!: Chevy and Coron goes to Panky`s tree house and wakes him up as they have plans to go to the Rainbow Park together. However, after the three arrived at the park, Chevy and Panky are gonna drink the water from the fountain until they notice some Zoobles hiding behind the tree somehow scared. They then encounter three mysterious Zoobles called the Black Candies, which composed of Blacky, a Vanilla Caramel flavored Fox Zooble, Mikey, a Chocolate Mint flavored Fox Zooble and Cooper, a Chocolate Banana flavored Giraffe Zooble. The three claimed the fountain for their own and the only way to reclaim it is to Chevy and her friends win a dancing competition against them. But there is one problem: Coron and Panky doesn`t know how to dance well. Go for it! Panky: Panky himself has a little problem crossing the pole. Because of this, Chevy and Coron consulted to Peel, a Cherry Flavored Bird Zooble to train him to be more assertive. But is this enough for him to be all active?

episode.title: うっかりポムくん / 虹の海のメルとリン
Careless Pom / Mell, Rin and the Rainbow Sea
Ukkari Pom-kun / Niji no Umi no Mell to Rin
episode.summary: Careless Pom: Pom, a Lemon Flavored Mouse Zooble received a letter from Panky about something while on the other hand Coron and Panky received a letter from him, explaining Panky`s close relation. Meanwhile Chevy caught a cold and is in her flower house all day as Pom greeted her but was told not to go near her due to her cold. But he actually mistold the whole thing to Randy, a Pudding flavored Koala Zooble, which makes her seriously mad to her and also to Pom. To correct everything on Pom`s mistakes, Chevy, Coron and Panky asked Kumampa for advice. Mell, Rin and the Rainbow Sea: Chevy and her friends received a letter from Mel, a Pink Grapefruit flavored seahorse Zooble to come and play with her. The three agrees and later met up with Mel and her friend fish Gonzales. As they dive underwater, they later met Rin, a Blue Hawaii flavored fish Zooble and told them about the Rainbow Pot being stolen by someone. As they found out who`s the culprit, Chevy and the others decides to get the pot back.

episode.title: 恋の花咲くこともある / 占いズーブルズ
Flower of Love Blooms / Fortune Telling Zoobles
Koi no Hana Saku Koto mo Aru / Uranai Zoobles
episode.summary: Flower of Love Blooms: Chevy and the others were happy today and went to the beach to relax. Until they meet with the comic duo named Chip and Tap as they all play in the beach. However, Chip later fell in love with Mikey, who is on the beach and the others need to do something to win his heart. As they ask Kumampa for advice, is it enough for Chip to win his heart? Fortune Telling Zoobles: As Chevy and Panky went to Coron`s house, the two learned that she is reading her own fortune from a book. They all then consulted to Reel and asked him if he can read their fortunes, however, one of the predictions to Coron caused her a lot of bad luck throughout the day as he predicted that something that shine is gonna happen with her love life. As the this prediction affected her, the predictions for Chevy and Panky are affecting them as well.

episode.title: ランディーの憂鬱 / スースーがやってきた!
The Melancholy of Randy / Su-Su Came!
Randy no Yuuutsu / Su-Su ga Yatte Kita!
episode.summary: The Melancholy of Randy: Randy is walking alone one day, having problems with something and Chevy and her friends noticed her. Panky accidentally knocked her in mud puddle as Chevy decided to help her get out of the mud. She later explained that she is in love with Em and somehow can`t admit her true feelings to him. Worse, Em is with another female Zooble in that time stalking him. The trio consulted Kumanpa to find a way to bring the two lovebirds together, though its advice didn`t made sense. However....after they went to see Randy wearing a strange mask, hilarity ensures as Em ends up with Silvy and she ends up heartbroken, again. Su-Su Came!: Chevy and her friends were doing Yoga one day in the Rainbow Fountain until Coron notices her milk bottle is upside down and empty. She blamed the two for it but then notices it wasn`t their fault. They then realize it was the work of Su-Su, a Pineapple Orange-flavored Monkey Zooble, and has come to Candy Land and is causing a lot of upside down pranks. And worse, the residents were in chaos on what he`s doing. Chevy and her friends need to stop him before the whole Candy Land goes upside-down!

episode.title: 鏡よ鏡! / キッチンランドは大騒ぎ
Mirror oh Mirror! / The Uproar in Kitchen Land
Kagami yo Kagami! / Kitchen Land wa Oosawagi
episode.summary: Mirror oh Mirror: Maron, a Grape flavored Rabbit Zooble is one day looking at the mirror, admiring her image. However, until she saw how overweight she is on the scales, she decided to go to the Rainbow Fountain to drink some slimming water to reduce her weight. At the same time, Chevy and Coron arrived at the park and they all saw her, confusing Chevy and sometimes thinking Coron is cuter than Maron. The next day, Maron is growing jealous and yet....admiring on Coron while hiding on the bushes. However after she fakingly fainted on the fruit she ate, the three were getting suspicious until Blacky shows up. [b]The Uproar in Kitchen Land:[b] Chevy and Panky called Coron one day as the trio plans to go to the flower fields for their picnic. As they get there and ate, Coron and Panky noticed how bad Chevy`s cooking is and decided to got to Ron`s Restaurant for the food. The three learned that her restaurant didn`t get much customers and the trio decided to invite the others. But when Ron got a problem with the fire used in cooking, they consulted Kumampa for advise on getting the only source of fire.

episode.title: 激辛ズーブルズ / 呪いの石
Spicy Zoobles / The Cursed Stone
Gekikara Zoobles / Noroi no Ishi
episode.summary: Spicy Zoobles: Chevy and her friends went to the northern region of Candy Land to attend and see the annual skating competition being held. There they met SunSan, a Habanero flavored Starfish Zooble and a figure skater champion with a rather posh attitude. Later on, Chevy and her friends spied onto her to study her skills like Kumampa suggested. At the day of the competition, Chevy is doing her best to win, until she notices something wrong with SunSan during the competition itself. The Cursed Stone: Chevy and her friends were rolling around so fast in candy land until they accidentally discovered a small shrine in the forest. Reel, a Soda Flavored Bird Zooble then appeared and warned them about the shrine, saying that whoever disturbs it will be turned to stone. Chevy and her Friends were cursed due to it, as they will be turned into stone until they told 10 of their friends to prevent it, but also causing a lot of chaos and confusion all over Candy Land. Em however knew that its just a rumor, but Chevy later finds out the stone in the shrine is actually Kumampa`s power stone.

episode.title: 絶交, けっこう! / にせものクマンパ現る!
Break off, fine! / Fake Kumampa Appears!
Zekkou, kekkou! / Nisemono Kumampa Araware!
episode.summary: Break off, fine!: An argument between Chevy, Coron and Panky over some ice cream caused them to break their friendship forever. As for them to not admit they`re sorry, Panky consulted to Kumampa on how they can rebuild their shattered friendship. Fake Kumampa Appears!: A rumor in the fields states that Kumampa`s around as Chevy and her friends heard about it. But as it turns out to be an impostor named ToTo, a Cappuccino flavored Lion Zooble who wants to meet Kumampa in person. It even gets confusing to the three that ToTo will do anything to meet him.

episode.title: 丸くて, 四角くて, 三角よ! / 清く美しくまん丸く
Circle, Square, Triangle! / The Circles of Beauty
Marukute, Shikakute, Sankaku yo! / Kiyoku Utsukushiku Manmaruku
episode.summary: Circle, Square, Triangle!: Chevy and her friends go to the western area of Candy Land to meet with Harry, a Dragon Fruit flavored Hedgehog Zooble. After they played together, Chevy and Panky drank the water from the forbidden fountain, both their heads changed shape and they need to find a cure to change them back. But a lot of trouble occurs to during their journey to the only cure, especially encountering a lot of Rock Creatures along their way. The Circles of Beauty: One day, Chevy and her friends went to the Rainbow Fountain just to find out no one`s around. They then encountered Panna, a Peach Yogurt flavored Panda Zooble. Chevy became totally shocked seeing her because she wanted to change Chevy`s tomboyish image and totally wants to style her to make her more feminine like other female zoobles do. This became a chase as Chevy is always running away from her to every area in Candy Land.

episode.title: 合コン大作戦! / ピピのしっぽ飾り
Joint Party Operation! / PiPi`s Tail Decoration
Goukon Dai Sakusen! / PiPi no Shippo Kazari
episode.summary: Joint Party Operation!: Chevy and her friends were all about to playing in the flower part until they encountered Frappe, an Apricot flavored Elephant Zooble who is having a hard time. The three convinced her to join her on their dance session but refuses. The trio then consulted to Kumanpa about Frappe`s problem and found out she is having problem about love. As they went to Frappe and talked about her love problem, they said they will find a suitable male Zooble for her. As the trio convinced Em about Frappe, Randy is about to get jealous. Also, Pom came tagging along making things worse for the trio, and even for Randy. PiPi`s Tail Decoration: Chevy encountered the Black Candies and was told about the sparkling tail decorations that was about in the range. Even worse, Coron and Panky had tail decorations on their tails as well until PiPi, a Peach Cheese Flavored Mouse Zooble arrived and admired their new tail decoration. Seeing that Chevy doesn`t have one, she gave Chevy a tail decoration as well, except it was the worst one she had and decided to get PiPi`s. However, it got worse when she notices she lost her tail decoration on her way to the Black Candies and PiPi became saddened. Having no choice, they all consulted to Kumanpa for the missing tail decor.

episode.title: さすらいのズーブルズ / 名探偵チェビー
Wandering Zoobles / Chevy the Master Detective
Sasurai no Zoobles / Meitantei Chevy
episode.summary: Wandering Zoobles: One day, Panky just encountered Happi, a Mint Acreola flavored bat Zooble, who hails from Candy Mountain. He is wandering all around Candy Land in search for his Happitat. As Panky showed Happi the whole place, he then took him to Chevy and Coron and introduced him. That night, Panky himself felt concerned that he doesn`t have a place to stay and the next day, the three decided to build him his own Happitat. But Happi himself didn`t have full of energy after a while and even Kumampa doesn`t have an advise to help then, leaving the three stuck. Until Chip and Tap`s appearance helped them. Chevy the Master Detective: The trio went to the Rainbow Fountain one day to see it was empty and dry. Chevy himself decided to solve the case by being a detective until the Black Candies showed up, but ended up being interrogated. Blacky and his lackeys were then proven innocent on the case, leading the three to search for clues. Blacky himself then blamed Chevy on the fountain until Coron found a clue: a lollipop. Panna arrived at the scene saying the helmet from the statue was gone. As the arrived there, they all say the saw lollipop and a strange mark on the ground, thinking it was Chevy`s doing. As the mystery goes deeper, they consulted Kumampa for advice on the disappearance and clear Chevy`s name on all the crimes.

episode.title: 流れ星とズーブルズ / モデルのシルビー
Shooting Stars and Zoobles / Silvy the Model
Nagareboshi to Zoobles / Model no Silvy
episode.summary: Shooting Stars and Zoobles: One night, Panky notices a strange shooting star that fell from the sky and knocked him out. Em came to his house to tell him about the shooting star before he left. Chevy and Panky later arrived and told him about, later decided the three to go to the shooting star summit to ride with the stars, until they encountered the Black Candies once again. Blacky challenges them to a race as to see who`s the fastest star rider, in which Chevy agrees. Silvy the Model: One day, Coron and Panky were reading some magazines about Silvy, a Melon flavored Tabby Cat Zooble until they accidentally rip a page. Chevy arrived later on as they talked about her until they noticed a huge crowd of Zoobles in the Rainbow Park surrounding Silvy as both Coron and Panky joins in. However, Silvy herself wanted to get away from the crowd and her fans due to too much pressure and its up to Chevy and Coron to distract everyone so Silvy can take a day off. But when Silvy gets sick the next day, its up to the three to do something to fill up her shoes.

episode.title: 詩人のリリーは感激屋さん / 今日はなんの日!
Poetic Lily`s Inspiring Shop / What Day is it Today!
Shijin no Lily wa Kangekiya-san / Kyou wa Nan no Hi!
episode.summary: Poetic Lily`s Inspiring Shop: Chevy and her friends one day encountered Lily, a Pomegranate flavored rabbit Zooble and decided to hide until they`re covet is blown. The trio always finds her weird as she always speaks in rhyme and always does poems, causing the others to get annoyed. But Lily always wants to join the group and play with them, as they accept. But everytime they play, Lily always does a strange poem and one time, causing the three to feel weird while she`s around. But when Lily is in trouble, Chevy and the others decides to save her, even if how annoying she is. What Day is it Today!: Maron is again admiring herself in the mirror one day as she remembered a party in Coron`s place due to her birthday. Later on, everyone is enjoying the cake Coron made as Maron again is getting jealous. After the party, Coron received a letter from Maron about her birthday party and consulted to Chevy and Panky about it as they both agreed. Coron is getting jealous as well as Maron`s plan worked. The three talked about it later on and Coron decide to host a revenge party to make Maron jealous. Maron does the same as well as both Zoobles were engaged in an all out party combat against each other. As the competition heats up, the group decided to consult Kumampa for advice.

episode.title: 郵便配達のミル / 恋占いにご用心!
Mail Carrier Mill / Love Fortune Telling Beware!
Yuubin Haitatsu no Mill / Koi Uranai ni Goyoujin!
ズーブルズ・カーレース / ようこそ, キャンディーファクトリーへ!
Zoobles Car Race / Welcome to the Candy Factory
Zoobles Car Race / Youkoso, Candy Factory e!
episode.summary: Zoobles Car Race: Chevy and her friends went to the Rainbow Fountain to drink some water until they saw the Black Candies driving some sort of new car. They again challenge the three to a race throughout Candy Land, which she agrees. As they consulted to Winny about the race and provided them a car, it`s gonna be an all out race throughout Candy Land. As the race heats up, the Black Candies cheats. Welcome to the Candy Factory: One day, Chevy and Coron went to see Panky as they go practice for a soccer tournament in Candy Land. But to them having short of one member they asked Q`n, a Papaya Flavored Monkey Zooble if she can help. After a while, they encountered Panna once more as she gave them a hands on until they encounter the Black Candies and teased the trio, especially to him. Panky decided to practice hard by himself, but later on Chevy noticed Panky`s getting clumsier every time and is getting left behind. As he got lost, he then fell off the cliff and got badly injured, Chevy and the others comes to his aid, but saw him out cold and almost about to die. Because of this, they got no choice but to call Kumampa and bring him to the Candy Factory to heal him up, or else he will die.

episode.title: 恋するクジラのエイミー / トフィーとトッシュ
Lovely Whale Amy / Toffy and Tosh
Koi Suru Kujira no Amy / Toffy to Tosh
episode.summary: Lovely Whale Amy: Chevy receives a letter on her Happitat as Mell and Rin invites her and friend to play to the sea immediately. However after Chevy meets Amy, a Sour Blueberry flavored Blue Whale Zooble, is it really love at first sight? Or a serious heartbreak that is about to happen. Toffy and Tosh: Toffy, a Coconut berry Bear Zooble came to Candy Land to play a role in an upcoming play. But after he meets Tosh, a Lemon Lime Flavored Mouse Zooble, he started to fell in love with her as he explained to the three. As Chevy and her friends notice this, they decided to play Cupid to get the two together, even if Toffy has to pretend to be a prince.

episode.title: 恥ずかしがり屋のロフ / クーペはラッキーガール?
Shy Loff / Coope`s a Lucky Girl?
Hazukashi Gari ya no Loff / Coope wa Lucky Girl?
episode.summary: Shy Loff: Chevy and her friends all went to the fields one day until they noticed a shy zooble rolling away, who is identified to be Loff, a Plum flavored Tabby Cat Zooble. Curious, they all decided to to meet her, but due to her shyness, she always runs away from the three even outsmarting the three Zoobles. In a last ditch effort, Chevy, Coron and Panky tried to make her come out of his ball form by tickling her, but also failed, leaving Chevy to call Kumampa for advice. Coope`s a Lucky Girl?: Ron`s donut shop as just been opened and it attracting a lot of customers, especially Chevy and the group. In the midst, they all met Coope, a Raspberry cheese flavored Giraffe Zooble who is seriously having issues about luck as she gets into all kinds of trouble. After they met Em, he decided to have a hiking trip with his friends, but everything goes wrong due to Coope`s bad luck.

episode.title: みんなでフリーマーケット / 叫ぼう, 大声大会
Everyone`s Flea Market / Roar, the Big Voice Tournament
Minna de Flea Market / Sakebou, Oogoe Taikai
コンビ解散!? チップタップ / しゃぼん玉に乗って
Combi Dissolution!? Chip Tap / Riding the Bubble
Combi Kaisan!? Chip Tap / Shabondama ni Notte
episode.summary: Combi Dissolution!? Chip Tap: Chevy, Coron and Panky went to the beach one day to have fun. But then, the trio sew Chip and Tap arguing each other for no apparent reason. As they consulted the two, the comedy duo were at each other due to one of routines gone wrong and decides to break up. Worse of all, the duo wanted either a new member to be either part of their group. The trio consulted Lily, however it didn`t help them. Now, Chevy and her friends must do everything to get the two back together. Riding the Bubble: Chevy and her friends were going to Winny`s happitat to look at his new invention: a machine that can blow giant bubbles and doesn`t crack when poked or touched. Chevy and her friends are amazed on the new invention, despite the flaws. However that night, the machine is stolen by someone and the whole happitat is in a mess. Winny is in a panic as they all trace down the culprit all over Candy Land, until they found out who did it as it causes trouble to everyone.

episode.title: ようこそホラーハウスへ! / あの子は見習い魔法使い
Welcome to the Horror House! / The Apprentice Child Wizard
Youkoso Horror House e! / Ano Ko wa Minarai Mahoutsukai
episode.summary: Welcome to the Horror House!: Chevy, Coron and Panky read a book about a mysterious Haunted House located somewhere in Candy Land as they all decided to go the said place. Coron herself wanted the diamonds that were in the abandoned house, but unknowing to them, the house is about to give them a bigger scare of their lives. Even worse, the Black Candies were also wanting the diamonds Coron is searching for. Later on, they finally discover the secrets inside the mansion with a little help. The Apprentice Child Wizard!: The trio were playing knights and magicians one day until they encountered Saku, a Sakura flavored cat Zooble who is a apprentice magician. Saku herself is having a test to get into the Magic Academy, but she has problems on using her magic as the trio decided to help her. As they all successfully taught her to ride the broom, Saku decides to practice some magic with the trio, thought this backfires and worse, it transforms the trio into Frogs! And turning them back will be much harder than it looks.

episode.title: 忍者アリアでござる! / チェビーのバースデー
Ninja Alia Arrives! / Chevy`s Birthday
Ninja Aria de Gozaru! / Chevy no Birthday
episode.summary: Ninja Alia Arrives!: Chevy and her friends were going to the flower fields to have a picnic until they had a strange encounter with Alia, an Apple flavored cat Zooble who studies in the way of the Ninja. She stole the three Zoobles` picnic and they must outsmart her to get their food back. But then Alia got stuck in a tree while chasing her and they must find a way to get her down. Chevy`s Birthday: Today is Chevy`s Birthday and she is pretty excited for her party as she went to Coron`s house to see the cake. But strangely, her friends were ignoring her today. Later on in the beach, she met Ninya, a Watermelon flavored octopus Zooble and was invited to meet Coco, a Cola flavored fish zooble. The three of them played together, not knowing to them that Chevy is feeling lonely without her real friends during her birthday.

episode.title: 怪盗ズーブルズ / ようこそ, クマンパのハピタットへ!
Phantom Thief Zoobles / Welcome to Kumampa`s Happitat!
Kaitou Zoobles / Yousoku, Kumampa no Happitat e!
episode.summary: Phantom Thief Zoobles: Chevy and Panky were both reading their favorite comics one day until a flash of thunder slightly scared them. They then saw thief named Mato, a tomato flavored bird zooble who is notorious on stealing junk as she flees. Coron also noticed the incident and they were getting a lot confused. As the day passes, everyone in Candy Land is relying on him on disposing junk, until she became angry and decides to kidnap Panky. Welcome to Kumampa`s Happitat!: Kumampa invites Chevy and her friends to go to his Happitat to have a Karaoke party. However the only problem is how to get there, being his only home is located above the sky. So the consulted their pilot friend and inventor Winny, an Apple Cinnamon Flavored reindeer zooble. But getting there is probably the least of their worries.

episode.title: 帰ってきたヒーロー / アールのティーパーティー
The Hero Came Back / Arl`s Tea Party
Kaette Kita Hero / Arl no Tea Party
episode.summary: The Hero Came Back: The trio went to the Candy Town Cinema to greet Tam, a Butter-flavored cat Zooble who recently came back from his trip in another town. Tam himself showed to the trio his skills and admitted that he fought a lot of enemies in the city he once visited. But when a real monster came, will it be enough for him to be called a hero when he`s not to begin with? Arl`s Tea Party: Chevy was invited to a Tea Party hosted by Arl, a Green tea-flavored bear Zooble. She herself isn`t usually used to tea parties until her friends convinced her otherwise. But this would go from better to worse for Chevy after an unlucky chain of events.

episode.title: 消えたキャンディーバッグ / クルーとクマンパ
The Candy Bag Disappears / Crew and Kumampa
Kieta Candy Bag / Crew to Kumampa
episode.summary: The Candy Bag Disappears: The trio were in the treehouse one day playing with their friends. During their break, Airo notices is admiring Coron and notices that Coron forgot her Candy Bag. Then she decided to dress-up like Coron and carries the same candy bag, even trying to pretend to be her. Later at the Rainbow Fountain, Airo then saw the Black Candies and made them happy by giving them some milk. Chevy`s group arrived later on and questioned the Black Candies about the bag, but with no leads, they decided to ask Kumampa. As the three learn something from his advice, they came up with a perfect plan to catch Airo and get Coron`s bag back. Crew and Kumampa: The trio came to Coron`s house one day to try Coron`s special Strawberry Milk as both Chevy and Panky began fighting. Crew, arrives and then tries to stop the fight and tells Chevy to pour the glasses again before he left. One day, the trio were having lunch as the Black Candies arrived and wants to join them, but the food is not enough. Crew himself came up with another solution and left. However, with them relying on Crew on their problems is starting to make Kumampa totally jealous and mad.

episode.title: ブラックキャンディーズの逆襲 / 芸術はまん丸だ!
The Black Candies` Counterattack / Art is a Perfect Circle!
Black Candies no Gyakushuu / Geijutsu wa Manmaru Da!
episode.summary: The Black Candies` Counterattack: Being fed up with Chevy all the time, Blacky decides to totally embarrass the feline Zooble after what she said to him as both Mikey and Cooper decides to help him. His first plan is making Chevy panic by laying down a lot of Banana peels in the park, however his first plan backfires as he was embarrassed in front of everyone. Back to the drawing board, he then came up with another plan which making her believe that they were attacked by a monster. But Chevy knew that something`s fishy is going on with the gang. Art is a Perfect Circle!: Coron and Panky met up with Pupu, a Blue Hawaii flavored elephant Zooble who is somewhat depressed over something. The two approached him and learned that he is looking for a model who is always active all the time until Chevy arrives, making him happy that he found the one for his pictures. But when Chevy denies the offer, he goes into a sad emotional streak, making her accept his offer for his sake. After a few mishaps and the Black Candies getting involved, Pupu seems to get much more pressure in his hands.

episode.title: ルーと風船 / チェビーと夕陽の花
Lou`s Balloon / Chevy and the Sunset Flowers
Lou to Fuusen / Chevy to Yuuhi no Hana
episode.summary: Lou`s Balloon: Lou, a Azuki bean flavored bear Zooble is celebrating her birthday today as Em decorates the place. Chevy and her friends arrived just in time for her party. But Lou is full of mischief and sometimes causes trouble to the four Zoobles taking care of her. Later on, they started the party and give Lou balloons, but after Coron presents her Strawberry Milk cake, the Black Candies also arrived and presented to her their cake: A Chocolate Mint cake while giving her some balloons too. While they argue about which cake is much more delicious, Em notices the young Zooble is missing from her crib and everyone saw her in the sky holding the balloons. Now they need to catch her before further trouble occurs or worse. Chevy and the Sunset Flowers: Chevy and Coron visited their friend Panky to found out about the rare phenomenon of the Sunset Flowers. Its said that the flowers blooms in the sunset once every year, seeing its a rare phenomenon that cannot be missed. The three decides to search for it, but they got no luck at all on the flower`s whereabouts. After a while, they decided to ask Kumanpa for advice. His hint helped them a bit on their search and ends up finding the flowers beneath the giant flower fields, not knowing that someone is stalking them due to the news about the flower`s rare blooming.

episode.title: パンキー, ワルになる? / 高麗人参味のチム
Panky, Became Bad? / Ginseng Flavored Chim
Panky, Waru ni Naru? / Kourai Ninjin Aji no Chim
episode.summary: Panky, Became Bad?: Chevy herself frightened Panky while the trio were going into the forest. Somewhat being a coward, Panky flees before the two found him outside the forest and talked about his cowardly personality as he runs away again. As he encounters the Black Candies, he then asked them if they can accept him in their group, surprising the group. The group taught him what they know, even making him as bad as they are. Though this attempt separates him from his real friends as Chevy and Coron tried to do something to make him leave the group. Ginseng Flavored Chim: The Trio were picking flowers one day in the forests of Candy Land as Chevy felt bored. She then saw an Elephant Zooble and the group asked him, but he responded harshly due to Chevy stepping into the grass. Later on, Chevy started to feel weird as Pom arrives. He explains to them about her condition and the cure, which can only be done by Chim, a Korean Ginseng-flavored Zooble. Coron and Panky encountered Chim and told them about Chevy`s condition, thought it never did go well while talking. Coron and Panky were almost out of options, and Chevy is almost close to dying. How will the two get out of this situation?

episode.title: PV
